people.name: Yury Mishinsky
people.notes: Drives the vision, sets deadlines, manages business/legal side. Prefers high-level results and weekly syncs.

people.name: Alex A (Aleksandruk)
people.role: AI Architect / Context Engineering / System Architect / DX Engineer / Evangelist / Spec-Driven Development Lead
people.notes: Responsible for overall technical architecture, agent-driven workflows, and context engineering. Bridges business requirements and technical implementation.

people.name: Aleksandr Ozherelev
people.notes: Owner of the backend implementation, Keycloak setup, and Kubernetes infrastructure. Prefers .NET stack.

people.name: Boris Markevich
people.notes: Manages access, credentials, and coordinates tasks between technical and business teams. Go-to person for access to competitor platforms.

people.name: Alex Semenov
people.role: Legacy Velvet Exchange Project Code Expert / Consultant
people.notes: Expert on the legacy crypto exchange codebase (Node.js). Key person for understanding existing assets.
